def_cn: (尤指体育赛事上的)拉拉队队员
def_en: A cheerleader is one of the people who leads the crowd in cheering at a large public event, especially a sports event.

def_cn: (事业或政客的)支持者，摇旗呐喊者
def_en: If you say that someone is a cheerleader for a particular cause or an individual politician, you mean that they are one of the chief supporters of this cause or politician and work hard to raise support for them.
